name: geochemically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that relates to the chemical substances in the earth's crust (= its hard outer layer): Analysis of the rock samples shows that they are geochemically closely related. This granite is less geochemically evolved and has a lower uranium content than the other granites.
More examplesFewer examplesAll of the other samples were geochemically analyzed at a laboratory in Australia.The data indicate the presence of two geochemically distinct groups.Analysis of samples suggests that Mars was a geochemically active environment.
